package day3LogicTest;

import java.util.Scanner;

//Q.1) Find factorial of a number using Recursive function

public class FactorialUsingRecursive {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Scanner sc= new Scanner(System.in);
		
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		
		int result=fact(n);
		System.out.println("Factorial of "+n+" is: "+result);

	}
	
	
	public static int fact(int n) {
		
		int f;
		
		if(n==0 || n==1) { 
			return 1;
		}
		else {
			f= n*fact(n-1);
		}
		return f;
		
	}

}



package day3LogicTest;

public class Pattern {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		//Q.3) Solve following pattern 

		//   *** 
		//   ** 
		//   * 

		for(int i=3; i>=1; i--) {
			for(int j=i; j>=1; j--) {
				System.out.print("*");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}

		//   3 
	//  323 
	// 32123 
	//  323 
	//   3 
		
		
	int n = 3;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
         
            for (int s = 1; s <= n - i; s++) {
                System.out.print(" ");
            }

            for (int j = n; j >= n - i + 1; j--) {
                System.out.print(j);
            }
            
            for (int j = n - i + 2; j <= n; j++) {
                System.out.print(j);
            }

            System.out.println();
        }

      
        for (int i = n - 1; i >= 1; i--) {
          
            for (int s = 1; s <= n - i; s++) {
                System.out.print(" ");
            }

           
            for (int j = n; j >= n - i + 1; j--) {
                System.out.print(j);
            }

            
            for (int j = n - i + 2; j <= n; j++) {
                System.out.print(j);
            }

            System.out.println();
        }

	}

}

package day3LogicTest;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class binaryInReverseOrder {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		//Q.4) Print  binary of a number in reverse order  eg. Input 4 O/P 0 0 1 
		
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		
		while (n > 0) {
            System.out.print((n % 2) + " ");
            n = n / 2;
        }
		
	}

}
